item.title: Kubernetes Cluster with Linode
item.description: Concepts Often, we need a kubernetes cluster for our lab/spike. This could be done with several ways without needing any real cluster. The following are some alternatives for local clusters. minikube Local kubernetes cluster, limited to one node and relies on virtualization. kind Kubernetes in Docker (that is why it called KinD). Used by kubernetes maintainer for their testing. A lot of very friendly developer tool. microk8s Lightweight multi-node cluster.

item.title: Terraform: Concepts and Getting Started
item.description: Concepts Terraform essentially a tool to manage your infrastructure. Given a set of configurations about how your infrastructure should look like, terraform would help to reconcile the configurations with reality.
